lines: 1. Bogima mbore Omosolaba,Yes'ateba "Ndigererie"'Nibo y'ense nig'ere bosa,Enibo engiya nase Yeso.
Rigereria Kalwari(rigereria kalwari),Onyore obogima(onyore obogima);Obogima bwa bosa(obogima bwa bosa),Rigereria kalwari(rigereria kaiwari rigereria).
2. Nkarigereri' Omotoria one,Nere agansasokera;'Ker'amatemw' agonchichera,Nindigererie Omosalaba.
3. Ndigereri'Omosalaba rioka,Nyegen'eira ya Nyasae;Onde takogw' as' amatemwa'yo bwegenete nguru chia igoro.
